text: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood.
author: Walt Disney

text: There's only one thing that can kill the movies, and that's education.
author: Will Rogers

text: The movies are the only business where you can go out front and applaud yourself.
author: Will Rogers

text: The length of a film should be directly related to the endurance of the human bladder.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

text: A film is - or should be - more like music than like fiction. It should be a progression of moods and feelings. The theme, what's behind the emotion, the meaning, all that comes later.
author: Stanley Kubrick
